00183 template<class V>
00184 BoundingVolume<V>::BoundingVolume(const BoundingVolume& rhs)
00185 :localPos(new V(*rhs.localPos)),
00186  worldPos(new V(*rhs.worldPos)),
00187  localExtent(new V(*rhs.localExtent)),
00188  worldExtent(new V(*rhs.worldExtent)),
00189  vertices(new float[rhs.vLength]),
00190  vLength(rhs.vLength),
00191  type(VOLUME)
00192 {
00193     for(int i = 0; i < rhs.vLength; i++) {
00194         vertices[i] = rhs.vertices[i];
00195     }
00196 }

00199 template<class V>
00200 BoundingVolume<V>& BoundingVolume<V>::operator =(const BoundingVolume& rhs) {
00201 
00202     *localPos = *rhs.localPos;
00203     *worldPos = *rhs.worldPos;
00204     *localExtent = *rhs.localExtent;
00205     *worldExtent = *rhs.worldExtent;
00206     
00207     float* vsOrig = vertices;
00208     vertices = new float[rhs.vLength];
00209     for(int i = 0; i < rhs.vLength; i++) {
00210         vertices[i] = rhs.vertices[i];
00211     }
00212     vLength = rhs.vLength;
00213     type = VOLUME;
00214     delete [] vsOrig;
00215 
00216     return *this;
00217 }
